title: Dropbox is done for: Get 10TB of end-to-end encrypted cloud storage for life
content:
Macworld

Stop renting space from cloud giants that mine your data and hike up prices — Internxt offers an open-source, end-to-end encrypted cloud storage platform here to replace Dropbox for good. For a limited time, you can get 10TB of lifetime cloud storage for just $279.99 ($70 off) when you use code STORAGE20 at checkout.

This isn’t just another storage locker. Internxt gives you full control over your files with zero-knowledge architecture and post-quantum encryption to help future-proof your privacy. Whether you’re backing up Final Cut Pro files or organizing project folders across iCloud and Finder, Internxt syncs seamlessly with macOS, iOS, and more—without the usual subscription baggage.

A privacy-forward powerhouse

  • End-to-End Encryption: Files are encrypted and fragmented before leaving your device
  • Zero-Knowledge Design: Only you hold the keys to your data
  • Post-Quantum Security: Protection built to outlast today’s threats
  • Works Everywhere: Access your cloud from macOS, iOS, Android, Windows, Linux, or the web
  • Open-Source & Audited: Transparent code and GDPR-compliant design

Mac users looking for a secure alternative to cloud storage subscriptions will appreciate Internxt’s blend of privacy, performance, and permanence.

Get Internxt’s 10TB Lifetime Cloud Storage Plan for $279.99 with code STORAGE20 before April 27 at 11:59 PM PST.
